marklogic.body: Things like this have been happening for years. I do not understand why people are so surprised.... this is the same country that legalized segregation... "separateÂ but equal". C'mon people that wasn't a long time ago. Africans (and other minorities) will Always be treated unequally as long as there's someone in higher power that feels they are better than the rest. This was wrong and I am so sorry she left the world on that Cold jail cell. Justice for Anna Brown! R.I.P
